mapper.select: SELECT m.member_pw AS member_pw, r.role_name AS roleName FROM member AS m INNER JOIN member_role AS mr ON m.seq = mr.member_seq INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.seq = mr.role_seq WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT seq FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT seq FROM role WHERE role_name = #{roleName}
